TextView.android:text: In English Language:\nSLISP was developed by a group of final year BIS students 2019 as a research project leading to the award of Bachelors degree in Information Systems at Makerere University.

SLISP was developed to facilitate the deaf and their caretakers who don't understand English, to learn and communicate in sign language.

The application also facilitates information sharing amongst the targeted users in form of chats.

All users are encouraged to add signs to the Application in order to populate the its knowledge base. 
Login for more functionalities of SLISP 

Thank you for using SLISP.

Mu Lulimi Luganda:
SLISP yakolebwa okuyamba bakigala n'ababalabilira aba tamanyi luzungu, Okuyiiga n'okutegeera engeri yo kukozesa olulimi lwa sayini.

Omutimbagano era guyamba abantu a bagendereddwa ogukoseza mukugaba n'okukubaganya ebilowoozo kubizibi bye basanga mubulamu obwabuligyo.

 Abakozesa SLISP bona bakubirizibwa okujongerako siyinizi. 
Yingila okusoboola okukozesa emigaso emirala egya SLISP. 

Webale Okukozesa SLISP.
